view.name: system, basic, detailed, grid, Tiles, Carousel, Boxes, grid

text.name: system_description
text.text: Place in library directory your magazine and videos. Acceptable extensions : jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Coloca en el directorio 'library' los elementos que conformarán tu propia bibilioteca de medios; como revistas, catálogos, vídeos, imágenes etc... Extensiones aceptadas: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Placez dans le répertoire de la bibliothèque votre magazine et vos vidéos. Extensions acceptées : jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz.

text.name: system_description
text.text: Coloque no diretório da biblioteca sua revista e vídeos. Extensões aceitáveis: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz.
